pageTitle: Itinerary for Saturday, March 25, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Saturday, March 25, 2017:

Ottawa, Ontario 

8:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the National Caucus meeting.

Centre Block, Room 237-C
Parliament Hill
Ottawa, Ontario

12:00 p.m. The National Caucus will break for lunch.

1:00 p.m. The National Caucus meeting will resume.

4:30 p.m. The National Caucus meeting will end.
